sqlMap.select: SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000717'

/* faa/cav/010/FAACAV010EMainselect */
SELECT ROWNUM AS KEY, A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS ACCMN_ID ,A.PROF_YM ,B.ORG_NM ,DECODE(A.BLL_HNDL_STA_CD,'Y','검산완료','S','불부합확정','I','접수통보','K','불부합대기','R','정정분접수','A','접수','T','정정분접수통보','N','검산오류' ) BLL_HNDL_STA_CD ,A.ACP_DH ,A.BLL_HNDL_DH ,B.MDF_PEN_NM ,B.TNB ,F_AV_ACNT_CD_NM(A.ACNT_CD) ACNT_NM ,B.ABLT_DT ,F_AV_BLL_COPT_CD_NM(A.COPT_CD) COPT_NM ,B.ACP_DVSN_CD FROM TWFAACAV001M A, TWFAACAV003M B WHERE A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.BLL_HNDL_STA_CD != 'E'
AND B.ORG_NM = #strOrgNm#
AND A.COPT_CD = #strCoptCd#
AND A.ACNT_CD = #strAcntCd#
AND 1 = CASE WHEN #strCoptCd# IS NOT NULL OR #strAcntCd# IS NOT NULL
THEN CASE WHEN #strProfDrtrSrno# IS NOT NULL
THEN CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = #strBllCd# AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = #strBllCd# THEN '1' END END
ELSE CASE WHEN #strBllCd# IN ('17', '18')
THEN CASE WHEN #strFildSsecYn# = 'N' THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('17', '18') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = '000' THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('17', '18') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('17', '18') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <> '000' THEN '1' END END END
WHEN #strBllCd# = '19'
THEN CASE WHEN #strFildSsecYn# = 'N' THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = '19' AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = '000' THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = '19' AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = '19' AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <> '000' THEN '1' END END END
WHEN #strBllCd# IN ('22', '23', '24')
THEN CASE WHEN #strFildSsecYn# = 'N' THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('22', '23', '24') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = '000' THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('22', '23', '24') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('22', '23', '24') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <> '000' THEN '1' END END END
WHEN #strBllCd# IN ('42', '43')
THEN CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('42', '43') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('42', '43') THEN '1' END END
ELSE CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = #strBllCd# AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = #strBllCd# THEN '1' END END END END
ELSE CASE WHEN #strProfDrtrSrno# IS NOT NULL
THEN CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = #strBllCd# AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = #strBllCd# THEN '1' END END
ELSE CASE WHEN #strBllCd# IN ('17', '18')
THEN CASE WHEN #strFildSsecYn# = 'N' THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('17', '18') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = '000' THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('17', '18') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('17', '18') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <> '000' THEN '1' END END END
WHEN #strBllCd# = '19'
THEN CASE WHEN #strFildSsecYn# = 'N' THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = '19' AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = '000' THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = '19' AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = '19' AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <> '000' THEN '1' END END END
WHEN #strBllCd# IN ('22', '23', '24')
THEN CASE WHEN #strFildSsecYn# = 'N' THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('22', '23', '24') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = '000' THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('22', '23', '24') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('22', '23', '24') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <> '000' THEN '1' END END END
WHEN #strBllCd# IN ('42', '43')
THEN CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('42', '43') AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD IN ('42', '43') THEN '1' END END
ELSE CASE WHEN #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# IS NOT NULL THEN CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = #strBllCd# AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno# THEN '1' END
ELSE CASE WHEN A.BLL_CD = #strBllCd# THEN '1' END END END END END
AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno#
AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = '000'
AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno#
AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <> '000'
AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strProfDrtrSrno#
AND A.PROF_YM LIKE #strYr#||'%'
AND A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm#
AND A.BLL_HNDL_STA_CD = #strBllHndlStaCd#
AND B.ORG_NM = #strCoptNm#
ORDER BY ACCMN_ID, PROF_YM

/* faa/cav/010/FAACAV010ESelectMainPop_1 */ SELECT CASE WHEN SUM_DVSN_ID='51' THEN '월계' ELSE CASE WHEN SUM_DVSN_ID='49' THEN '합계' ELSE SUM_DVSN_ID END END AS SUM_DVSN_NM ,ACCT_CD||'-'||CHIF_CD||'-'||SSEC_CD||'-'||DITM_CD||'-'||SITM_CD AS ACSDS_CD ,THMN_EXPN_BND_AMT ,THMN_TO_EXPN_BND_ATAG ,THMN_EXPN_AMT ,LTMN_TO_EXPN_ATAG ,THMN_REN_EXPN_AMT ,THMN_SUBJ_ASO_RCTF_EXPN_AMT ,EXPN_SBTR_ATAG ,EXPN_BND_BL ,F_AV_BLL_COPT_CD_NM(COPT_CD) AS COPT_NM ,F_AV_ACNT_CD_NM(ACNT_CD) AS ACNT_NM ,(SELECT AGGR_CONCAT (M.EAN_CD,', ') FROM (SELECT dguard.decrypt('TB_ENC','EAN',EAN) || '-' || ACCT_SUBJ_CD AS EAN_CD FROM TWFAACAV062L WHERE COPT_CD = #strAccmnId1# AND ACNT_CD = #strAccmnId2# AND BLL_CD = #strAccmnId3# AND PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strAccmnId4# AND DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strAccmnId5# AND ACNT_YR = SUBSTR(#strYm#,0,4)) M ) AS ACNB_CD ,F_AV_ACCMN_NM(COPT_CD,ACNT_CD,BLL_CD,PROF_DRTR_SRNO,DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO) AS ORG_NM ,SUM_DVSN_ID ,COPT_CD ,ACNT_CD ,BLL_CD ,PROF_DRTR_SRNO ,DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO ,PROF_YM ,ACCT_CD, CHIF_CD,SSEC_CD,DITM_CD,SITM_CD FROM TWFAACAV048L WHERE COPT_CD = #strAccmnId1# AND ACNT_CD = #strAccmnId2# AND BLL_CD = #strAccmnId3# AND PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strAccmnId4# AND DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strAccmnId5# AND PROF_YM = #strYm# ORDER BY SUM_DVSN_ID DESC, ACCT_CD, CHIF_CD, DITM_CD, SITM_CD

/* faa/cav/010/FAACAV010ESelectMainPop_2 */ SELECT CASE WHEN SUM_DVSN_ID='51' THEN '월계' ELSE CASE WHEN SUM_DVSN_ID='49' THEN '합계' ELSE SUM_DVSN_ID END END AS SUM_DVSN_NM , DTM_COPT_CD , DTM_ACNT_CD , DTM_BLL_CD , DTM_PROF_DRTR_SRNO , DTM_DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO , THMN_FND_ALC_AMT , THMN_TO_FND_ALC_ATAG , THMN_EXPN_RQ_AMT , THMN_TO_EXPN_RQ_ATAG , EXPN_AMT , THMN_TO_EXPN_ATAG , THMN_REN_EXPN_AMT , EXPN_SBTR_ATAG , NEXPN_AMT , THMN_GOV_OP_XPN , THMN_TO_GOV_OP_XPN_ATAG , GOV_OP_XPN_REN_AMT , GOV_OP_XPN_SBTR_ATAG , EXPN_ATAG , BL , NPMT_AMT ,F_AV_BLL_COPT_CD_NM(COPT_CD) AS COPT_NM ,F_AV_ACNT_CD_NM(ACNT_CD) AS ACNT_NM ,(SELECT AGGR_CONCAT (M.EAN_CD,', ') FROM (SELECT dguard.decrypt('TB_ENC','EAN',EAN) || '-' || ACCT_SUBJ_CD AS EAN_CD FROM TWFAACAV062L WHERE COPT_CD = #strAccmnId1# AND ACNT_CD = #strAccmnId2# AND BLL_CD = #strAccmnId3# AND PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strAccmnId4# AND DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strAccmnId5# AND ACNT_YR = SUBSTR(#strYm#,0,4)) M ) AS ACNB_CD ,F_AV_ACCMN_NM(COPT_CD,ACNT_CD,BLL_CD,PROF_DRTR_SRNO,DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO) AS ORG_NM ,SUM_DVSN_ID ,COPT_CD ,ACNT_CD ,BLL_CD ,PROF_DRTR_SRNO ,DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO ,PROF_YM FROM TWFAACAV033L WHERE COPT_CD = #strAccmnId1# AND ACNT_CD = #strAccmnId2# AND BLL_CD = #strAccmnId3# AND PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strAccmnId4# AND DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strAccmnId5# AND PROF_YM = #strYm# ORDER BY SUM_DVSN_ID DESC
